data.meanings: (Kaf-Alif-Nun) To be, exist, happen, occur, take place, become, be such or so.
data.sentence: The word يَكُنْ comes from the root ك و ن and is associated with the meanings: (Kaf-Alif-Nun) To be, exist, happen, occur, take place, become, be such or so.

data.meanings: Negative particle giving to the present the sense of the perfect; not.
data.sentence: The word وَلَمْ comes from the root ل م and is associated with the meanings: Negative particle giving to the present the sense of the perfect; not.

data.meanings: make/call it one, unity, anyone/anything.ahada ashara (eleven).
data.sentence: The word أَحَدٌ comes from the root ا ح د and is associated with the meanings: make/call it one, unity, anyone/anything.ahada ashara (eleven).
